# value

**Instance Property**

The main accessor for the bind value.

## Declaration

```swift
var value: T { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property returns the animated value ([doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BindableValue/animatedValue]) if an animation is active. Otherwise, this property returns the base value ([doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BindableValue/baseValue]).

When you assign a value to this property, the setter assigns the value you provide to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BindableValue/baseValue].

## Accessing the value

- **baseValue**: A value that reflects the state of the animated property before or after an animation.
- **animatedValue**: A value that represents the state of the animated property as an animation progresses.
